Reviews.Title: App is sometimes slow
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: It works, but sometimes the app is very slow to send commands to the vehicle.  It will have a spinning circle on the screen for awhile before sending a command.

Reviews.Title: SmartStart ROCKS!!!
Reviews.Author: Cnote
Reviews.Content: I've had nothing but issues with my wife locking herself out of the car. 1 product that FINALLY ended my nightmare.

Reviews.Title: Not usable !!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Tan
Reviews.Content: this product is not able to use in Malaysia, i wasted my money. anyone interested? i will sell at half price. it should not sell openly and should be more clear in notify buyer that this product can only use in USA and Canada. i email to asked, but was not told.

ProductInfo.Features:
Compatible iPhone, BlackBerry or Android smartphone (not included)
An activated SmartStart service plan. Choose from Secure 1-year or Secure 3-year plans starting as low as $3/month
SmartStart currently works in the United States and Canada
ProductInfo.Name: Directed Smart Start DSM200
